alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 9:04PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hartford, southeastern Hampshire and western Hampden Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 903 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Granby, or 12 miles northwest of Windsor, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, Simsbury, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Suffield, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Canton, Southwick, Granby and Southampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
